mapper.sql: id, title, optionA, optionB, optionC, optionD, answer, author, modifyTime

id,
title,
optionA,
optionB,

answer,

modifyTime,

mapper.update:
update question
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
optionA = #{optionA,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
optionB = #{optionB,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
optionC = #{optionC,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
optionD = #{optionD,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
answer = #{answer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
author = #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modifyTime = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=DATE},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update question set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, optionA = #{optionA,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, optionB = #{optionB,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, optionC = #{optionC,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, optionD = #{optionD,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, answer = #{answer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, author = #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modifyTime = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=DATE} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
